body:
Yo whats up guys, new to the forums, but kind of a from start of the server till now player of wallsmc.com
yea fun fact, you can use wallsmc.com as the ip is others doesn't work.

Back to topic, I was just wondering if Avicus can bring back ghost squads

  For those who do not know what Ghost Squad is, Ghost squad is basicly 2 teams with the maximum of 4-6 players PER team and they all have Invisibility II
  And the game goal is to eliminate every other team players.
  In the map, there will be some random placements of pressure plates and some lamps which will show your position if you step on them
  Another way to take them out, is to look for those slight particals of the potion effect.
  There are also kits in the game which was brusier (starts with a wood sword that has maximum unbreaking and knockback I) Archer (has 8 arrows, with a unbreaking bow, arrows can be retrieved if missed, and you can pick up others arrows) Scout (speed I, knockback II, sharpness I stick) blaze (a blaze rod that has fire aspect I ONLY) Chemist (2 posion I pot, not extended, 3 insta damage I pot, 1 potion of slowness) Healer (5 insta health (I) potion, 2 regen I potion)                                                       basically it, and these are these are some ideas for kits
 Tanker : Resistence I for the whole game, weakness I also, wooden sword with unbreaking

title: Ghost Squads

replies.body:
Seeing this was already done and didn't go very well, I don't see it happening as a crapton of the community disliked the game.
Soz -1

p.s. Welcome to the forums, where we talk about random things that probably half the time have nothing to do with the server :)
